text: (avarkal viruppappati) oru vacanattai nir avarkalitam kontu varavittal (atarkup patilakat tankal viruppappati karpanaiyaka oru vacanattai amaittu) ‘‘itai nir vacanamaka etuttukkolla ventama?'' Enru (parikacamakak) kurukinranar. Atarku (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka: ‘‘En iraivanal enakku vahyi mulam arivikkappattavarraiye nan pinparrukiren. Ituvo unkal iraivanal (unkalukku) alikkappatta nallarivakavum, nampikkai konta makkalukku nervaliyakavum, (iraivanin) arulakavum irukkiratu
